DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare clinical performance Biofinity Toric ( comfilcon A ) contact lens , versus Air Optix Astigmatism ( lotrafilcon B ) 1 month daily wear .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Biofinity Toric Versus Air Optix Astigmatism
DOC.detailed_description: Single mask , open label , randomize , bilateral , crossover study design compare comfilcon A lotrafilcon B lenses 1 month daily wear study lens . Each subject randomize wear test lens ( comfilcon A ) control lens ( lotrafilcon B ) one month daily wear repeat schedule second pair without washout period .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is adapt soft toric contact lens wearer Has contact lens spherical prescription +6.00 10.00 ( inclusive ) Have less 0.75diopter ( D ) astigmatism 2.25D eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Patient contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule A person exclude study he/she : Has contact lens prescription outside range available parameter study lens . Has spectacle cylinder less 0.75D 2.25 D cylinder either eye . Has history achieve comfortable contact lens wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens best correct distance vision bad 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) either eye . Presence clinically significant ( grade 24 ) anterior segment abnormality Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has Presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study .
